snippet: The allegations by the family of Mr. Marshall, who spent a few days at Rikers Island before transferring to an upstate prison in 2013, were made public in court filings this week.
abstract: Legal petition filed in New York State Supreme Court reveals family of late Anthony D Marshall's alleges that he was badly mistreated by officials at Rikers Island in 2013, where he spent several days before being transferred to upstate prison; petition claims New York City Correction Dept has withheld or destroyed documents concerning Marshall's incarceration.
lead_paragraph: The allegations by the family of Mr. Marshall, who spent a few days at Rikers Island before transferring to an upstate prison in 2013, were made public in court filings this week.

headline.main: Anthony Marshall, Brooke Astor’s Son, Experienced ‘Atrocious’ Treatment at Rikers, His Family Says
headline.print_headline: Astor’s Son Faced ‘Horrific Treatment’ While at Rikers Island, His Family Says
